author: Predeactor
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not save data about users persistently.
description: Let users complete a captcha before entering the server.
install_msg:
Hi.
This cog is outdated.
Please use my other cog "Captcha" for an up-to-date cog with the same functionallity.
If you still load the cog, you'll receive a private message everytime you reload the cog or restart your bot. (Meaning stop using this cog, really)
